item.title: Notes on Stack Machines and Quantum Stack Machines
item.description: arXiv:2511.17264v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Multi-stack machines and Turing machines can simulate to each other. In this note, we give a succinct definition of multi-stack machines, and from this definition it is clearly seen that pushdown automata and deterministic finite automata are special cases of multi-stack machines. Also, with this mode of definition, pushdown automata and deterministic pushdown automata are equivalent and recognize all context-free languages. In addition, we are motivated to formulate concise definitions of quantum pushdown automata and quantum stack machines.
item.dc:creator: Daowen Qiu
